name: KenneyLand
description:
You're dreaming. Grow stronger than your nightmares.

  • Controls: WASD to move, Spacebar to jump.
  • Collect the Golden Stars to grow bigger, and eat your nightmares.
  • Collect all the Stars to win.

Quick experiment for the Kenney Jam 2022 with the theme 'Growth'. Sadly, I missed the deadline.

Music: Timebender, by MouthlessGames. (cc-by 3.0)
